title: Hidden universe: the brain. Part 2
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Brain

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Infants - Development
description: Discusses the cause of aphasia and shows experiments with infants which test their cognitive development and general learning patterns. Also includes a study of visial perception and the advances being made toward giving sight to the blind, as well as looking at a variety of brain malfunctions and current treatment.
